name.jp: マッドランハムスター

description.en: Cute Hamster that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: Cute Hamster that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: Um lindo Hamster que segue seu dono e coleta itens caídos.
description.cns: 可爱的小仓鼠跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein süßer Hamster, der seinem Herrchen folgt und Gegenstände aufsammelt.
description.fi: Cute Hamster that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: Cute Hamster that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: invoque un mignon hamster qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis
description.id: Cute Hamster imut yang setia mengikuti pemiliknya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: Cute Hamster that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: マッドランハムスターを召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 귀여운 햄스터를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: Cute Hamster that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.pl: Cute Hamster that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ru: Очаровательный хомячок, который послушно семенит за хозяином и подбирает предметы.
description.sp: Lindo Hamster que persigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: Cute Hamster that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.th: Cute Hamsterที่ตามเจ้าของไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่ดรอป
description.tw: 可以召喚或解除貪吃的黃金鼠。功能：自動撿取掉落在周圍的物品。
description.vi: Hamster dễ thương đi theo chủ nhân của nó xung quanh và nhặt các vật phẩm bị đánh rơi.
